full_summary:
======================

**Tender Title** 
----------------
2100 Walkley Roof Replacement

**Reference Number**
-----------------
WS4389328690-Doc4390687024

**Classification and UN Supply Classification**
---------------------------------------------

* Classification: Building Construction Management
* UN Supply Classification: 81101513
* Description: The project aims to replace the roof at 2100 Walkley Rd, Ottawa, ON.

**Tender Status and Description**
-------------------------------

* Tender Status: Cancelled
* Tender Description: There were no responses due to the added modifications to the bid submission deadline. All bidders have been informed of the changes as per the notice. Bidders are reminded that a mandatory security requirement is included in this procurement.

**Security Requirement**
---------------------

* Bidders must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) at the deadline of the bid submission. Failure to comply with this requirement will render the Bid non-compliant.

**Site Visit Information**
-------------------------

* A site visit is scheduled for January 19th at 10 am. Interested bidders are to meet at 2100 Walkley Rd, Ottawa, ON.
* Bidders who plan on attending the site visit must provide their name and the name of their company to the Contracting Authority by January 16th at 5 pm. Attendance will only be allowed for those who have RSVP'd by this date.

**Latest Changes**
---------------

* The bid submission deadline has been modified to March 1st, 2024 at 2 pm EST. All bidders are required to submit their completed bid packages by this deadline to be considered.

**Supplier Information and Bidding Documents**
-----------------------------------------------

* For all inquiries regarding the procurement or to obtain the bidding documents, please visit the URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18490797

**Contracting Authority Information**
-----------------------------------

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Authority: SPAC/PSPC
* Email: gillian.fenwick2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Project Need**
----------------

* The 2100 Walkley Road government facility is in need of a new roof, with the successful bidder being required to replace the current roof structure.

**Question and Answer Session**
------------------------------

* Please use the following contact information for any questions and concerns about this project: 
	+ Name: Gillian Fenwick2
	+ Email: gillian.fenwick2@tpsgc-p
